inicio.descripcion_breve: EcoGuardians 2.0 is an educational game designed to promote environmental awareness.
inicio.descripcion_larga: AWAQ ONGD is a global organization committed to empowering and preserving communities in their mission to protect and restore biodiversity. Using emerging technologies to help people and communities around the world protect and restore their biodiversity.
inicio.descripcion_expandida: Since 2019, AWAQ has worked on projects that promote ecosystem conservation and positive impact on local communities. One of its main focuses is the Northern Caldas Biological Station (EBNC), a key space for research, ecotourism, and environmental awareness.

sponsors.descripcion: Thanks to our partners, we continue to support impactful environmental and social projects.
